name: Secret IT Person
description:
***WARNING*** THERE ARE FLASHING IMAGES IN THE GAME!!!

Controls:

Mouse to Look

WASD to Move

Left Click to interact

X to close screen

Made for the 2nd Macquarie Game Jam with the theme of reboot. In this game you are the secret I.T person where you go fixing everyone's computers by rebooting their computers, (because rebooting your computer always fixes the problem), but you must be quick before the office turns into complete chaos by angry workers. Careful not to get caught or they might just throw you around.
